ProductRequired.name: ProductRequired
ProductRequired.description: Represents a product that is needed to complete a work order or work order line item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isnâ€™t null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

ParentRecordId.description: The work order or work order line item for which the product is required.

ParentRecordType.description: Specifies whether the parent record is a work order or a work order line item.

ProductName.description: The name of the product required.

ProductRequiredNumber.description: The auto-generated number identifying the product required.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Units of the required product. For example, kilograms or liters. Quantity Unit of Measure values are inherited from the Quantity Unit of Measure field on products.
